alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Northern Jackson; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:38AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northeastern Swain and northwestern Haywood Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1237 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Gatlinburg, or 6 miles northeast of Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sylva, Cherokee, Maggie Valley, Dillsboro, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, B.R. Parkway-Smoky Mountains To Balsam Gap, Smoky Mountains-Cataloochee, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Smoky Mountains-Oconaluftee and Lake Junaluska. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
